src_cluster_name: Master
src_cluster_ip: x.x.x.x
src_cluster_username: src_username
src_cluster_password: src_password

dest_cluster_name: Aux_far
dest_cluster_ip: y.y.y.y
dest_cluster_username: dest_username
dest_cluster_password: dest_password
dest_cluster_pool_name: mdiskgrp0

application_host_ip: a.b.c.d
application_host_username: host_username
application_host_iqn: "iqn.1111-11.com.redhat:1a11a1111a11"

application_iscsi_ip:
    - node_name: node1
      portset: portset0
      ip_address: p.p.p.p
      subnet_prefix: 24
      gateway: p.p.p.1
      port: 6
    - node_name: node2
      portset: portset0
      ip_address: q.q.q.q
      subnet_prefix: 24
      gateway: q.q.q.1
      port: 6

src_vol_name: vdisk_application1
host_name: linux_host
dest_vol_name: vdisk_application1
rel_name: r1
